parser.database

Interface FolgersDatabase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FolgersSQLDatabase

    public interface FolgersDatabase
    This interface specifies the necessary actions, a storage of any kind needs the be able to handle to be used in the parser
    Author:
    Matt_2

      Removes all entries from the whole databse

    • Method Detail

      • clearDatabase

        void clearDatabase()
        Removes all entries from the whole databse

      • insertIntoPerson

        boolean insertIntoPerson(Person person)
        Parameters:
        person - the Person to be inserted into the database
        Returns:
        true if insertion was successful
        false if not

      • insertTweet

        boolean insertTweet(Tweet tweet)
        Parameters:
        tweet - the Tweet to be inserted into the database
        Returns:

        false if not

      • getReplacableNames

        java.util.Map<java.lang.CharSequence,java.lang.CharSequence> getReplacableNames()
        Gets all people from the database that are marked as replacable with their twitter-ids
        Returns:
        A map containg the original names as keys and the the twitter-ids as the corresponding values
